name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crispy romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Pasta coated with a creamy sauce made from eggs, Parmesan, and pancetta.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Toasted bread topped with mashed avocado and a sprinkle of chili flakes.

name: Chicken Curry
description: Rich and flavorful chicken cooked in a creamy spiced curry sauce.

name: Sushi Rolls
description: Rice rolls filled with fresh fish, avocado, and cucumber, wrapped in seaweed.

name: Tacos al Pastor
description: Mexican street tacos filled with marinated pork and topped with pineapple and cilantro.

name: Berry Smoothie Bowl
description: A thick smoothie topped with fresh berries, granola, and seeds.

name: Beef Burger
description: Juicy beef patty served in a bun with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

name: Chocolate Brownie
description: Rich and gooey chocolate brownie topped with a dusting of powdered sugar.
